DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial study KOS-862 men metastatic prostate cancer fail docetaxel-containing regimen .
DOC.brief_title: Study KOS-862 ( Epothilone D ) Metastatic Prostate Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This study Phase 2 , single arm study KOS-862 men metastatic prostate cancer fail docetaxel-containing regimen . PSA response primary end-point objective response check available .
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age . Metastatic disease . One previous treatment include docetaxel ( Taxotere ) . At least 3 week since last surgery/radiation/chemotherapy ECOG Performance Status 0 , 1 2 Active brain metastasis
